title: Pesuren Pesuren Lyrics Pannaiyarum Padminiyum Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Pesuren pesuren
Singer(s): Justin Prabhakaran, Vairam, Pandiyamma, Thayamma
Movie:Â Pannaiyarum Padminiyum
Music: Justin Prabhakaran

Pesuren pesuren kadhal mozhi
pesaama pesuren kangal vazhi
yaarindha gramathu devadha
naanenna solluven novudhu
eudthupoga thudikkudhu manam
enakku enakkunu

Podaa podaa thookkikittu
unna yaaru inga ketkuradhu.
saami unna melirundhu
oru saatchi pola paakuradhu.

Pesuren pesuren kadhal mozhi
pesaama pesuren kangal vazhi

Kadhir adichcha kalamaanen
kall erinja kulamaanen
kanne un kan pattathaal.

enakku yedho aayaachu
edhakandaalum neeyaachu
kadhalthaan vel vittathaa?

Thaavaniyaa maaridanum
thozhumela aeridanum
idayum sadayum nadayum
kodi perum
en idhayam nizhayaai pinnaal
odi varum

Pesuren pesuren kadhal mozhi
pesaama pesuren kangal vazhi

Kurukka nedukka nadapottu
kulunga kulunga isai paatu
paadaadho un kolusu

Madam pidicha thaer pola
varapadanja neer pola
aadaadho en manasu

Panjaangaththa paakkureney
iyer kitta ketkureney
myile unna naan manakkum
thaedhiyathaan
naan mudhalnaal iravil solven
meedhiyathaan

Pesuren pesuren kadhal mozhi
pesaama pesuren kangal vazhi
yaarindha gramathu devadha
naanenna solluven novudhu
eudthupoga thudikkudhu manam
enakku enakkunu

Podaa podaa thookkikittu
unna yaaru inga ketkuradhu.
saami unna melirundhu
oru saatchi pola paakuradhu.
